caption.p: The chemical structures of 10-undecenoic (UD) acid and oleic (OL) acid, their alkyne derivatives (UDY and OLY), and the hydroxyl building blocks synthesized from them using either thiol-ene (TEC) or thiol-yne (TYC) as a key synthetic step (d, od, and t refer to diol, oligomeric diol, and triol, respectively, whereas 1, 2, and 3 refer to R = H and n = 6, and 1′, 2′, and 3′ to R = –(CH 2) 7–CH 3 and n = 5).
